amendment.description: Amendment directs the Cybersecurity Workforce Assessment to examine the potential expansion of temporary assignments of private sector cybersecurity professionals to Federal agencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 111-410 to direct the Cybersecurity Workforce Assessment to examine expanding temporary assignments of private sector cybersecurity professionals to Federal agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Langevin.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
